short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic Backgammon Game - Move all your checkers around the board and bear off all your pieces from the board before your opponent!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Backgammon is a HTML5 Board Game.
Move all your checkers around the board and bear off all your pieces from the board before your opponent!
Two game’s mode:
Play against a friend locally
Challenge the computer

INTRODUCTION
Play Classic Backgammon on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!
Multilanguage The game runs in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Portuguese and German. If the player’s browser runs in one of the languages supported, the game will be automatically translated. If not, it will run in English by default.

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Classic Backgammon extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Classic Backgammon icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Classic Backgammon popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
See on the game
